string.text: Deprecated
Deprecated
Deprecated
Deprecated
PSO-1M

PSO (for Pritsel Snaipersky Optichesky, "Optical Sniper Sight") is a series of Soviet-made optical scopes produced by Novosibirsk Instrument-Making Plant (NPZ Optics State Plant). In common use since 1964 when it was introduced as a standard issue telescopic sight for SVD sniper rifle. The scope has been later adapted to assault rifles such as AK-74 or AN-94. Recognized for its durability, versatility and very well-designed reticule pattern featuring convenient range-finder scale. This particular type has 4.0x magnification rate, making it usable mainly for combat at long ranges. It is attached to weapons by means of a dovetail mount, which is standard in Warsaw Pact countries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]PSO-1
PSO-1M

Military grade sniper optical scope PSO 1M2-1, manufactured by Zenit-Belomo. This optical scope is designed for precision sight fire with Special Sniper Rifle (VSS) and Dragunov Sniper Rifle (SVD) on the variety of targets with 4x magnification and 6 degree FOV.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]no
PSO-1M2-1

The PSO-1M2-O1 features an extremely effective and useful height-based rangefinder for dual use, with graduated scales for both standing and prone figure estimation. The 400 meter Simonov height based gradient (choke style) rangefinder has a chevron for use with the 9x39 calibre rifles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]PSO-1-1
Kobra EKP 1S-03

The Kobra sight is an open collimator combat optic using a laser generated HUD to superimpose a reticle pattern onto a filtered lens. It is designed for engaging fast moving targets and targets appearing for a short period of time in close quarters and urban combat in various light conditions. It provides clear targeting from 104 lx to 10-2 lx (daylight, twilight and moonlight), one or two eye targeting. Effective when shooting from moving vehicles.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1] none (collimator)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
Kobra EKP 8-02

The Cobra sight provides confident aiming in natural light conditions (bright sunny day, deep twilight and moonlit night) due to the presence of 16 levels of manual brightness adjustment of the aiming mark. The location of the aiming mark and target in the same plane allows for aiming with both one and two eyes, which creates an unlimited field of view for the shooter, and conduct effective high-speed shooting at quickly moving, small and suddenly appearing for a short time targets.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
OKP-7

The original design can be used under any conditions, and also, if necessary, allows the use of a standard mechanical device. The main feature of the sight is the mount of the reflector without a mechanical frame, covering an appreciable part of the firing sector. Reflector protection in extreme conditions is provided by a thin and durable metal visor, which practically does not interfere with firing.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
PK-A

Another long time favorite, the PK-A is a sturdy and robust red dot tube optic. Originally appearing to be an adaptation of the original PSO SVD optic, the PK-A has a similar construction and the same style of hammer grey finish.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
1P29 "Tulpan"

The USP-1 sight (index 1P29) has an optical arrangement with a prism-erecting system. Sighting angles are set mechanically by turning the sight body relative to the weapon mounting bracket. Requires no batteries as it is tritium illuminated. The ranging scale at the edge of the sight's field of view provides a means to find visually the range of up to 1200 m of a target 1.5 m high.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]no
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]PSU-1
1P29 "Tulip"

The USP-1 sight (index 1P29) has an optical arrangement with a prism-erecting system. Sighting angles are set mechanically by turning the sight body relative to the weapon mounting bracket. Requires no batteries as it is tritium illuminated. The ranging scale at the edge of the sight's field of view provides a means to find visually the range of up to 1200 m of a target 1.5 m high.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]PSU-1
1P59 "Giperon"

The Giperon pancratic sniper sights are designed for target reconnaissance and aimed fire from sniper rifles, and providing for automatic input of the sighting angle during target ranging. Compared to the organic PSO-1 sight, the 1P59 Giperon pancratic sight improves the effectiveness of SVD fire 1.3-2 times (depending on the target range and size) through a greater magnification, a more accurate rangefinder, combining target ranging and sighting angle input operations, as well as the sighting angle input scale incorporated within the field of view of the sight.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]no
1P76 "Rakurs-À"

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night. The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]no
1P78 "Kashtan"

1P78 is one of the newest optics to enter into service with the Russian armed forces. The design is similar in concept to the ACOG with a relatively low magnification (2.8x) and ability to point and shoot without having to adjust any controls.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
1PN93-1 Night Sight

The generation 2 night sight with fixed magnification (4 diopters). Option 1PN93-1 is designed for combat in conditions of poor visibility at medium distances. Designed for mounting on weapons with standard dovetail mount (like Warsaw Treaty countries).
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Nighvision: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
1PN93-4 Night Sight

The 1PN93 SVD night sights are designed for target detection and recognition and aimed fire at point-blank range under natural night illumination conditions. 1PN93-4 is Gen. 3 of night optic.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Nighvision: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
PGO-7V

The PGO-7 optical sight is the main sight of the RPG-7 hand grenade launcher. It serves to aim a grenade launcher when firing at targets located at different ranges.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Eyecup: %c[ui_gray_1]yes
PN-23 Night Sight

The PN23 is a dedicated night vision sight. It features a compact size teamed with a useful 3x magnification range. This provides an impressive 400 meter recognition range with a very wide field of view at 12°. The illuminated reticle is designed to provide both speed and precision.
Night sight PN-23 "Nozzle"

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]Some sniper rifles with integrated scopes
 
%c[ui_gray_1]A variant of the PN-23 sight, repeating the functionality of such systems as STIC - i.e. the sight is attached in front of the standard one.
Barska AC10632

The Barska Electro Sight Multi Reticle Red Dot Sight AC10632 was developed in order to be the best product for anybody looking for a high quality sights. Can be mounted on NATO weapons and on AK-12.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none (collimator)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
C-MORE ATRW

High performance red dot sight that provides an unlimited field of view, while eliminating obstruction and tunnel vision common to tube style scopes. The Railway series has a standard rail base pre-installed to allow the sight to be attached to most Weaver or Picatinny rail mounts or receivers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none (collimator)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]good
EOTech 553

Holographic sight for NATO assault rifles and submachine guns.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]none (collimator)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
Trijicon ACOG

ACOG stands for Advanced Combat Optical Gunsights and refers to a family of firearm scopes produced by the Trijicon company. Scopes of this type are usually of high quality and have an internal tritium-based reticule illumination. This particular type has a USMC-style reticule and features adjustable magnification.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]4x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]USMC
Trijicon ACOG

Detachable optical scope made specifically for NATO rifles. ACOG stands for Advanced Combat Optical Gunsights and refers to a family of firearm scopes produced by the Trijicon company. Scopes of this type are usually of high quality and have an internal tritium-based reticule illumination. This particular type has a modern 'trijicon' reticule pattern and fixed magnification of 2.0x.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Magnification: %c[ui_gray_1]2.0x
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Condition: %c[ui_gray_1]very good
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Reticule pattern: %c[ui_gray_1]trijicon
Trijicon RMR

Trijicon RMR (RMR) is a compact reflex sight. The RM07C is an LED sight powered by a standard CR2032 battery. Housed in rugged forged aluminum, it's extremely tough yet lightweight. The easy-to-use adjusters with audible clicks allow for quick windage and elevation adjustments. Featuring eight available brightness settings, the reticle can be manually adjusted by pressing the plus or minus buttons on either side of the unit. To switch to auto adjust mode, simply press both buttons simultaneously and release.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint Micro T1

The Aimpoint Micro T1 is a very durable short range sight featuring a parallax-free, unlimited field of view. It is renowned for its build quality and its ability to endure harsh conditions. With its very low power consumption, its battery life is measured in years.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Spacer: %c[ui_gray_1]high
Aimpoint Micro T1

No matter what your mission, the size and weight of your equipment is a critical factor. With the Aimpoint® Micro T-1, Aimpoint has introduced an aiming system that provides the performance of our full-sized sights in a small package. Since its introduction in 2007, the Aimpoint® Micro T-1 has become very popular worldwide due to its size, light weight and robust build quality.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Spacer: %c[ui_gray_1]low
ELCAN SpecterDR

The SpecterDR 4x/1x Dual Role Optical Sight represents a revolution in optical sight design. The world’s first truly dual field of view combat optical sight, the SpecterDR switches instantly from a 4x magnified sight to a 1x CQB sight with the throw of a lever. Unlike zoom sights, the SpecterDR offers an optimized optical path and identical eye relief in both 4x and 1x modes. Depending upon the situation, the user may adjust the sight to illuminate the crosshair or just a brilliant red dot in the center. In 1x mode, the SpecterDR has by far the largest field of view in the industry. In 4x mode the SpecterDR offers a generous field of view, long eye relief, and ELCAN’S legendary crystal clear image. The SpecterDR 4x/1x offers the best single solution for both Medium Range and CQB engagements and is designed to withstand the rigors of modern professional use. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
OKP-7

The original design of OKP sights allows firing from unstable positions in rapidly changing conditions, reduces the operator fatigue, and, if necessary, allows unhindered use of base mechanical sights. The key feature of this sight is a rimless reflector attachment that doesn't block any field of fire sections; instead, reflector is protected by thin and durable visor that is almost un-noticeable when firing. This variant is installed on the dovetail type mount.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Docter Sight III

Docter as a brand was born in 1991, but the company started writing its story much earlier. It was previously called Carl Zeiss Jena. In the 1980s, this was one of the largest optics manufacturing companies in the world. They started operating more than 100 years ago and built an impeccable reputation throughout the years. After World War II, the company started growing rapidly and bloomed until East and West Germany merged in 1991. This was when the first major change happened – the company was taken over by Bernhard Docter. Shockingly, the company bankrupted. Analytic Jena Group bought Docter in 1997, and the company started growing again. In 2018, a change in administration occurred. The company was renamed from Docter to Noblex. Most of the products remained in the offer but Noblex added some new ones as well. They retained the famous logo – the owl. Throughout the years, Docter has been known to offer high-quality Made-in-Germany products for an affordable price. Because of that, the company gathered plenty of followers, loyal to the brand. Since 2018, when Noblex took over, the company expanded their manufacturing processes elsewhere.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24

From close quarters to long range target engagements, the Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS 1.1-8x24mm incorporates everything Military, Law Enforcement and Competition shooters need into one extremely versatile riflescope. The illuminated front focal plane reticles provide accurate range estimation throughout the entire zoom range. Eight brightness settings ensure optimal visibility of the illuminated reticle in all lighting conditions and are compatible with night vision devices. An off position between each numbered brightness setting ensures long battery life and nearly instant return to the desired reticle intensity.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Meprolight M21

Meprolight Mepro M21 is a battle-proven red dot sight, tested in the harshest conditions imaginable. It doesn’t work on a battery but is powered by a fibre optic collector system during the day and by tritium at night – when all other sights fail, M21 will continue to work. With a QD-detachable mount, you will be able to mount and dismount this sight from the Picatinny platform in a matter of seconds. it can be paired with night vision goggles and scopes which greatly increases its usability. Meprolight is an Israeli company, founded in 1990. They offer includes day optical devices, night vision devices, thermal imaging devices, self-illuminated night sights, etc. Their products have been tested to withstand the harshest conditions imaginable, which is why they are popular with the military and law enforcement. The company complies with NATO and US military specifications as well as International MIL Standards.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint PRO

Aimpoint Patrol Rifle Optic is designed with input from a distinguished group of current and former professionals. The Patrol Rifle Optic incorporates many never before seen features to maximize this sight's performance within the challenging conditions faced by modern law enforcement. The Aimpoint® PRO sight comes in a ready-to-go kit at a budget friendly price, a concept that appeals strongly to Law Enforcement units.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
1P76 "Rakurs-À"

The 1P76 optical sight designed for battlefield surveillance, target selection, target ranging and aimed fire against luminous and illuminated targets during the day, at dusk and at night. The sights have a wide field of view that allows for quick terrain observation in a fast-moving combat situation simultaneously with the naked eye and through the sight without loss of target visibility.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Kobra EKP 8-18

Kobra Military 8-18 Red Dot Weaver Rifle Scope, Screw Mount. The world famous Kobra is an open collimator "red dot" combat optic using laser-generated "heads-up display" (HUD) technology to superimpose a reticle pattern onto a filtered lens which acts as an aiming device for the shooter. This system presents an unobstructed field of view, in 1x power which allows for extremely comfortable, "both eyes open" shooting. On average, most users will see a 1.5 times faster target acquisition and a 50% smaller shot group at 100 meters, in comparison to the iron sights. It is designed for engaging fast moving targets and targets appearing for a short period of time in close quarters and urban combat situations in various light conditions. It provides clear targeting from 104 lx to 10-2 lx (daylight, twilight and moonlight), one- or two-eye targeting, is very effective when shooting from moving vehicles, and allows for perfect kill shots on fast-moving, small and spontaneously appearing targets.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
EOTS-62

The Electroptical Targeting System EOTS-62, was developed by in secret laboratories inside the Zone for use with ultra-precise weapon known as “Type 62”. It can be mounted on a “Picatinny rail” type mount. Has a target detection function.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP

March Tactical 3-24x42 First Focal Plane scope, reliable and accurate with ammunition of any power. Made by japanese DEON Optical Design Corporation company. The March-F 3-24x42 Tactical Riflescope is the go to scope for both long range hunters and tactical shooters all over the world. The scope has a 42mm objective lens made of extra low dispersion optical glass that allows for a bright and clear sight picture in most light conditions. The scope features tactical exposed turrets for windage and elevation, parallax correction from 10 yards to infinity, and an Illuminated tactical reticle in the first focal plane.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Aimpoint CompM4s

The Aimpoint® CompM4s sight, with low battery compartment, belongs to the CompM4 series of sights which are the finest sights Aimpoint has ever produced. Improvements include advanced energy efficiency that provides up to 8 years of continuous use from a single AA battery!
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Thales Optics SUSAT L9A1

SUSAT is 4X optical sight, developed in the UK at the Royal Arms Research and Development Center. Manufactured by Avimo as well as United Scientific Instruments. It is most often used for aimed fire from light small arms at medium and long distances. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Firefield Kemper XL-M

The Kemper XL-M is a panoramic open red dot sight, ideal for high-speed shooting, offhand shooting and shooting at moving targets. Unlike the civilian model, the "M" -armic variant of the sight is made of a more durable aluminum alloy - i.e. Specially designed for harsh environments.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Trijicon Tactical Kit

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by the American based Trijicon company. This kit gives the ability to install two scopes : the Trijicon Acog BAC 5.56 BDC and the Trijicon RMR on rifles that have a picatinny or a weaver mount. With this setup, the shooter has the ability to quickly adapt from long range to short range engagements, and vice versa, without any discomfort.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
Leupold RMR Tactical Kit

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by the American based Leupold and Trijicon companies. This kit gives the ability to install two scopes : the Leupold Mark 8 CQBSS and the Trijicon RMR on rifles that have a picatinny or a weaver mount. With this setup, the shooter has the ability to quickly adapt from long range to short range engagements, and vice versa, without any discomfort.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
SpecterDR RMR Tactical Kit

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by the Canadian based ELCAN and the American based Trijicon companies. This kit gives the ability to install two scopes : the SpecterDR DFOV14-C2 1-4x and the Trijicon RMR on rifles that have a picatinny or a weaver mount. With this setup, the shooter has the ability to quickly adapt from long range to short range engagements, and vice versa, without any discomfort.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
OKP-77 (For Picatinny/weaver)

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2]OTs-02 Kiparis
 
%c[ui_gray_1]This sight differs from the OKP-7 in a less cumbersome mount, which allows you to install the collimator on a short picatinny rail on the Kiparis SMG.
EOTech XPS3-0

The XPS3 is smaller and lighter than all other holographic weapon sights but just as fast. Law enforcement officers and hunters appreciate the light weight and compact size for carrying convenience on the job and in the woods. The XPS3 runs on a single 123 battery. The single-lithium-battery configuration allows more rail space, leaving more room for rear-iron sights, magnifiers, or a night vision mount.
Deltapoint PRO

The DeltaPoint Pro is proof that you don’t have to compromise performance, even on a small sight. Its incredibly wide field-of-view and crystal-clear glass dominates the competition, while its rugged aluminum housing and steel sheath ensure it will perform in the harshest conditions. Ease-of-use was also a focus when designing this elite red dot sight, which is why we put an easy access battery compartment on top and gave it click-adjustments for more precision. And this isn’t just a pistol sight either; the DP Pro is just as at home on AR’s, shotguns, and pretty much anything else that goes bang.
PSO-1Ì2-1 and Trijicon RMR Tactical Kit

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by the Belarusian based ÁåëÎÌÎ and the American based Trijicon companies. This kit gives the ability to install two scopes : the PSO-1Ì2-1 and the Trijicon RMR on rifles that have both dovetail and picatinny mounts. With this setup, the shooter has the ability to quickly adapt from long range to short range engagements, and vice versa, without any discomfort.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]CONTENT:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] PSO-1Ì2-1
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Trijicon RMR
1P78 "Kashtan" and Trijicon RMR Tactical Kit

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by the Russian Central Design Bureau "Tochpribor" and the American based Trijicon companies. This kit gives the ability to install two scopes : the 1P78 Kashtan and the Trijicon RMR on rifles that have both dovetail and picatinny mounts. With this setup, the shooter has the ability to quickly adapt from long range to short range engagements, and vice versa, without any discomfort.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Dovetail mount
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Picatinny/weaver rail
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]CONTENT:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] 1P78 Kashtan
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Trijicon RMR
KP SR-2

The KP SR-2 Reflex Sight is designed to increase the efficiency of shooting from a 9x21mm SR-2M submachine gun in any weather and visibility conditions.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Native SR-2M mount
Thales Optics SUSAT L9A1

SUSAT is 4X optical sight, developed in the UK at the Royal Arms Research and Development Center. Manufactured by Avimo as well as United Scientific Instruments. It is most often used for aimed fire from light small arms at medium and long distances. It is mounted on a special mount for the L85 “Dovetail”. (The scope has back up iron sights on top of it).
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]REQUIRES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Native L85 mount

9mm Sound Suppressor

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 9 mm calibre weapons
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Suppressor for 9mm pistols and submachine guns. An effective sound suppressor for calibre 9x18 weapons. It is very archaic and yet quite effective. Its body contains a tightly-packed roll of fine brass mesh. The front of the unit comprises a set of rubber wipes with calibre-sized holes for the bullet to pass through. Normally used for close-combat engagements against lightly-armoured enemies and for assassinations.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]very high

US Army Smallbore Rifle Sound Suppressor

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 5.56x45 calibre weapons 
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Advanced rifle suppressor of US design and manufacture, which has apparently 'disappeared' from one of the US Army supply containers. It consists of hi-grade steel body filled with four extension chambers, followed by a series of Z-type titanium baffles. The unit almost completely reduces muzzle flash and considerably suppresses sound emitted when firing. It also requires minimum maintenance. Suppressors of this and similar types are commonly used on all smallbore Western-made rifles and remain in active service in Western armed forces.
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]medium
Salvo 12 Sound Suppressor

%c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBILITY:
 
%c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] 12 calibre
 
%c[ui_gray_1]Salvo 12 silencer for 12" shotguns made by SilencerCo. Designed to operate with most pump action and semi automatic shotguns and almost all commercially available ammunition, at its full length of 12" the Salvo 12 brings sound down to 136.8 dB at the muzzle with #7 shot. Configurations of 6", 8", 10", and 12" allow the end user to customize the Salvo 12 for sporting clay, waterfowl, turkey hunting, home defense, and many other applications and accept the appropriate tradeoff of size for sound reduction. 
 
%c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Sound suppression: %c[ui_gray_1]high

"Swamp Thing" tactical kit for AK-105

A rare and not very popular body kit for the AK-105 due to its price. Very similar to kit used by Duty. It is found mainly among veterans of the Clear Sky group. The set includes: an extended fore-end, an ergonomic stock and a more comfortable pistol grip. In addition, the kit includes an improved trigger and three sighting devices that turn the weapon into an "ideal companion" at close and medium-long distances. Scopes (included): Elcan SpecterDR, Trijicon RMR calimator sight mounted at 45 degrees and AN/PEQ-15 LAM. The kit also includes a set of 45 rounds mags. This upgrade is irreversible.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] AK-105
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]CONTENT:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Elcan SpecterDr and Trijicon RMR
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] AN/PEQ-15 LAM Laser Device
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Extended 45 rounds magazine

A rare and hard to get body kit for the AK-105. Very similar to kit used by Clear Sky. It is found mainly among veterans of the Duty group. The set includes: an extended fore-end, an ergonomic stock and a more comfortable pistol grip. In addition, the kit includes an improved trigger and three sighting devices that turn the weapon into an "ideal companion" at close and medium-long distances. Scopes (included): Trijicon Acog, Trijicon RMR calimator sight mounted at 45 degrees and AN/PEQ-15 LAM. The kit also includes a set of 45 rounds mags. This upgrade is irreversible.

PSO RMR Tactical Kit. (for dovetail mount and picatinny/weaver)

This tactical kit includes combination of two scopes made by Belorussin ÁåëÎÌÎ and US Trijicon companies. The kit gives ability to install two scopes PSO-1Ì2-1 and Trijicon RMR on rifles that have both dovetail and picatinny mounts. This setup allows shooter to use his rifle on short and long distances without any discomfort.
